Various grains (which may be malted) are used for different varieties, including barley, corn (maize), rye, and wheat. Whisky is typically aged in wooden casks, generally made of charred white oak.
ingredient.353.name: Whiskey Cream
ingredient.353.description: Whiskey cream is a creamy liqueur blending whiskey with dairy and sweetness. It brings a smooth, dessert-like richness to cocktails and after-dinner drinks.
ingredient.354.name: Whiskey-Barrel Aged Bitters
ingredient.354.description: Bitters aged in whiskey barrels for vanilla and oak notes. Adds depth to **Old Fashioneds** and **Whiskey Sours** with minimal effort. Use sparingly to avoid overpowering lighter spirits.
ingredient.355.name: White Cuban Rum
ingredient.355.description: Cuban rum is defined by a specific "Spanish-style" production method that results in a profile typically lighter, drier, and crisper than its caribbean neighbours.
ingredient.356.name: White Port
ingredient.356.description: Port is a fortified Portuguese wine at 19–22% ABV with rich sweetness. Use it in a **Lisbon Martini ** or **Maria McClaire**.
ingredient.357.name: White Rum
ingredient.357.description: Light rum with subtle sweetness, often filtered clear after ageing, around 40% ABV. Clean flavour for mixing without heavy molasses. Standard choice for **Daiquiris** and **Mojitos**.
ingredient.358.name: White Wine
ingredient.358.description: White wine is a crisp fermented grape wine at 11–13% ABV. Enjoy it in **Kir**.
ingredient.359.name: Wild Turkey
ingredient.359.description: Wild Turkey is a brand of Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey distilled and bottled by the Austin Nichols division of Campari group. the distillery is located near Lawrenceburg, Kentucky, United States.
ingredient.360.name: Worcestershire Sauce
ingredient.360.description: Worcestershire sauce is a fermented liquid condiment. It features a complex, savoury flavour profile and is a staple in many classic cocktails, most notably the **Bloody Mary**.
ingredient.361.name: Yellow Chartreuse
ingredient.361.description: Milder 40% ABV sibling to green Chartreuse made by carthusian monks with 130 herbs. Honeyed, saffron-tinged herbal sweetness. Excellent in cocktails needing softer herbal notes.
ingredient.362.name: Yukon Jack
ingredient.362.description: Yukon Jack is a liqueur advertised as the "black sheep of Canadian liquors". It is a 100 proof (in USA) or 80 proof (in Canada) drink, made from Canadian whisky and honey. the taste is sweeter than straight whisky and bourbon, due to the honey that is added.
ingredient.363.name: Żubrówka
ingredient.363.description: Żubrówka is a polish bison grass **vodka** with 37–40% ABV. It has a unique herbal, vanilla-like aroma.
cocktail.1.description: A bold, spirit-forward agave spirit drink built around **mezcal**, **cognac**, **Punt e Mes** bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with **orange**.
cocktail.1.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 22.5 ml of **mezcal**, 22.5 ml of **cognac**, 30 ml of **Punt e Mes**, 15 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 2 dashes of **creole bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.2.name: 20th Century
cocktail.2.description: The 20th Century cocktail is a classic cocktail that was first created in 1937 by a British bartender C.A. Tuck and named in honor of the celebrated 20th Century limited train which ran between New York City and Chicago. It's a sophisticated and elegant drink that combines London dry **gin**, **Lillet Blanc** (a French aperitif wine), **lime juice**, and **crème de cacao white**.
cocktail.2.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 20 ml of **Lillet Blanc**, 20 ml of **crème de cacao white**, and 10 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.3.description: This cocktail is similar to the **Cuba Libre** and may refer to any drink consisting of **whiskey** mixed with a **lemon** soft drink. It was originally made with **Seagram's 7 Crown whiskey**, but any **whiskey** can be used.
cocktail.3.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **whiskey** and 150 ml of **7-Up**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktail.4.name: ABC
cocktail.4.instructions:
1. Pour 15 ml of **amaretto** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15 ml of **Baileys** on top of the **amaretto**.
3. Using a teaspoon, pour 15 ml of **cognac** on top of the **Baileys**.

cocktail.5.name: Acapulco
cocktail.5.description: A tropical long drink that combines **tequila** and **white rum** with **pineapple** and **grapefruit juice**, balanced by fresh **lime juice** and a touch of **simple syrup**.
cocktail.5.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **tequila blanco**, 50 ml of **white rum**, 75 ml of **pineapple juice**, 50 ml of **grapefruit juice**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 10 ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass over fresh **ice**.

cocktail.6.name: Adonis
cocktail.6.description: A classic cocktail created in 1884 and named after the first broadway musical to run for more than 500 performances. the ratio of sherry and vermouth may be varied to make the cocktail sweeter or drier accordingly.
cocktail.6.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Amontillado sherry**, 45 ml of **red vermouth**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.7.name: Adriatique
cocktail.7.description: A complex liqueur cocktail where **Amaro Nonino** and **Aperol** meet citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with **orange**.
cocktail.7.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Amaro Nonino**, 15 ml of **Aperol**, and 30 ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.8.name: Adult Chocolate Milk
cocktail.8.description: A dessert-style cocktail that blends chocolate liqueur, cream liqueur, milk, and cream into a chilled, silky serve.
cocktail.8.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of Godiva dark chocolate liqueur, 15 ml of **Baileys**, 60 ml of whole **milk**, 15 ml of heavy **cream**, and 15 ml of **chocolate syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with 2 shavings of grated **chocolate**.

cocktail.9.name: Affogato cocktail
cocktail.9.description: A rich, dessert-style blended cocktail inspired by affogato, combining **grappa**, **coffee liqueur**, crème de cacao, **espresso**, and **ice cream** for a creamy, boozy coffee treat.
cocktail.9.instructions:
1. Add 45 ml of **grappa**, 15 ml of **coffee liqueur**, 15 ml of **crème de cacao brown**, 15 ml of **espresso**, 1 scoop of **ice cream**, and about 45 g of **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and frothy.
3. Pour into a chilled glass.
4. Garnish with 3 **coffee beans** floated in a petal formation in the center of the cocktail’s foamy head.

cocktail.10.name: After Eight
cocktail.10.description: Inspired by the classic **mint** **chocolate** thin, the after eight cocktail is a rich, indulgent dessert drink that can be served as a sophisticated martini or a fun layered shot.
cocktail.10.instructions:
1. Pour 15 ml of **coffee liqueur** into the bottom of a shot glass.
2. Carefully float 15 ml of **green crème de menthe** over the back of a spoon to create a distinct layer.
3. Slowly layer 15 ml of **Irish cream** on top using the same spoon technique.

cocktail.11.name: After Midnight
cocktail.11.description: A bittersweet, orange and maraschino-influenced riff on a Rob Roy.
cocktail.11.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **Scotch whisky**, 22.5 ml of **Punt e Mes**, 15 ml of **orange curaçao**, 7.5 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 6 dashes of **vanilla bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.12.name: After Midnight Martini
cocktail.12.description: A late-night alternative to an Espresso Martini.
cocktail.12.instructions:
1. Pour 22.5 ml of **vodka**, 22.5 ml of **coffee liqueur**, 22.5 ml of **red vermouth**, 15 ml of **Pedro Ximenez sherry**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled glass.
6. Garnish with 3 **coffee beans** floated in the center.

cocktail.13.description: A bold, spirit-forward agave spirit drink built around **tequila blanco**, **red vermouth**, **Campari**—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with **orange**.
cocktail.13.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **tequila blanco**, 30 ml of **red vermouth**, and 30 ml of **Campari**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktail.14.name: Alabama Slammer (long)
cocktail.14.description: A bold and fruity southern classic combining **Southern Comfort**, **amaretto**, and **sloe gin**, topped with **orange juice**. Sweet, rich, and deceptively strong, with a smooth almond and stone-fruit depth.
cocktail.14.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Southern Comfort**, 20 ml of **amaretto**, 20 ml of **sloe gin**, 90 ml of **orange juice**, and 10 ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a Collins glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktail.15.name: Alabama Slammer (shot)
cocktail.15.description: A classic southern party shot made with **amaretto**, **Southern Comfort**, and **sloe gin**, balanced with **orange juice**. Sweet, fruity, and deceptively strong.
cocktail.15.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Southern Comfort**, 30 ml of **amaretto**, 30 ml of **sloe gin**, 15 ml of **orange juice**, and 15 ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktail.16.name: Alexander
cocktail.16.description: A classic, rich, and velvety cocktail combining **gin**, white crème de cacao, and **cream**. the alexander is smooth, lightly sweet, and dessert-like, with subtle **chocolate** notes balanced by botanical **gin** and a luxurious, silky texture.
cocktail.16.instructions:
1. Pour 45 ml of **gin**, 22.5 ml of **crème de cacao white**, 22.5 ml of **cream**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktail.17.name: Alexander the Great
cocktail.17.description: A luxurious, dessert-style cocktail that blends smooth **vodka** with rich **coffee liqueur** and white crème de cacao, finished with fresh **cream** for a silky, indulgent texture and gentle **chocolate**-coffee sweetness.
cocktail.17.instructions:
1. Pour 45 ml of **vodka**, 15 ml of **coffee liqueur**, 15 ml of **crème de cacao white**, 22.5 ml of **cream** and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Garnish with a pinch of **cocoa powder** and/or a pinch of **chocolate**.

cocktail.18.name: Alexander's Big Brother
cocktail.18.description: A decadent, creamy **gin**-based cocktail combining **gin**, **triple sec**, and **blue curaçao**. Silky, dessert-like, and indulgent, with a subtle citrus brightness and a striking color. Garnished with **physalis** for a lightly tart contrast.
cocktail.18.instructions:
1. Pour 45 ml of **gin**, 7.5 ml of **triple sec**, 22.5 ml of **blue curaçao**, 22.5 ml of **cream**, 5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Garnish with a **physalis**.

cocktail.19.name: Alexander's Sister
cocktail.19.description: A classic creamy **gin** cocktail with bright **green crème de menthe** and smooth **cream**, creating a dessert-like balance of herbal freshness and silky sweetness. Elegant, refreshing, and indulgent, often served as an after-dinner drink and garnished with fresh **mint** or grated **nutmeg**.
cocktail.19.instructions:
1. Pour 45 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **crème de menthe green**, 15 ml of **cream**, 5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
6. Garnish with a **mint** leaf and a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktail.20.name: Alien Brain Haemorrhage
cocktail.20.description: A visually striking layered shooter that looks like a floating brain in liquid. Sweet **peach schnapps** forms the base, creamy **Baileys** curdles into brain-like shapes, and a splash of **blue curaçao** or **grenadine** adds an eerie, bloody effect. Smooth, sweet, and slightly citrusy.
cocktail.20.instructions:
1. Pour 30 ml of **peach schnapps** into a chilled shooter glass as the base.
2. Slowly drip 10 ml of **Baileys** into the schnapps using a spoon or the back of a straw so it curdles and forms a brain-like shape.
3. Gently add a few drops of **blue curaçao** and **grenadine** on top to create a bleeding effect.
4. Serve immediately and drink in one shot.

cocktail.21.name: Alien Brain Tumor
cocktail.21.description: A visually striking layered shooter with sweet citrus notes, creamy texture, and a pomegranate finish.
cocktail.21.instructions:
1. Pour 20 ml of **blue curaçao** into a shooter glass.
2. Slowly layer 20 ml of **Baileys** so it forms a brain-like shape.
3. Add 5 ml of **grenadine**, a drop at a time to create a bleeding effect.

cocktail.22.name: Alligator
cocktail.22.description: Alligator is a popular green cocktail that prominently features kiwi fruit liqueur or fresh kiwi fruit to achieve its signature swamp-like hue and tropical flavour profile.
cocktail.22.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **gin**.
3. Add 30 ml of **lemon juice**.
4. Add 22.5 ml of **kiwi fruit liqueur**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into a martini glass.
7. Garnish with a **kiwi fruit** slice.

cocktail.23.name: Alpine Avenger
cocktail.23.description: A rich, creamy dessert cocktail combining the cool freshness of **peppermint schnapps** with the smooth sweetness of **white crème de cacao** and **milk**. Velvety, chocolatey, and refreshing at the same time, it tastes like a liquid **mint** **chocolate** dessert served warm or chilled.
cocktail.23.instructions:
1. Add 30 ml of **peppermint schnapps** and 15 ml of **crème de cacao white** into a heat-resistant glass or Toddy glass.
2. Heat 240 ml of **milk** gently until hot but not boiling.
3. Pour the hot **milk** into the glass.
4. Stir gently to combine.
5. Garnish with about 2 pinches of grated **chocolate** or a light dusting of **cocoa powder**.
6. Serve immediately while warm and enjoy.

cocktail.24.name: Amado
cocktail.24.description: A rich and silky rum-based cocktail with delicate floral sweetness from **rose syrup** and a velvety texture from **egg white**. Elegant, dessert-like, and indulgently smooth.
cocktail.24.instructions:
1. Pour 60 ml of **white rum**, 20 ml of **lime juice**, 15 ml of **rose syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Garnish with a drop of Angostura bitter.

cocktail.25.name: Amalfi Spritz
cocktail.25.description: A refreshing, delicately bittersweet, sweet-and-sour, and more interesting take on a **Limoncello Spritz**.
cocktail.25.instructions:
1. In a chilled wine glass, add 45 ml of **limoncello**, 7.5 ml of **Strucchi Bitter**, 7.5 ml of **lemon juice**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
2. Top with 90 ml of **prosecco**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Add **ice** to chill and dilute slightly.
5. Garnish with 2 **lemon** slices.

cocktail.26.name: Amalia
cocktail.26.description: A light, sparkling rum cocktail designed for effortless sipping. Fresh **kiwi fruit**, **lime** and floral elderflower are balanced by **white rum** and lifted with bubbly mixers over **ice**, finished with a cooling **mint** garnish.
cocktail.26.instructions:
1. Cut **kiwi fruit** in half and use a spoon to scoop flesh from one half into shaker.
2. In a shaker, muddle fresh **kiwi fruit** pieces to release juice and aroma.
3. Add 50 ml of **white rum**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 30 ml of **elderflower cordial** to the shaker.
4. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
7. Top gently with **ginger ale**.
8. Give a light stir to integrate the layers without losing bubbles.

cocktail.27.name: Amaretto Sour
cocktail.27.description: A classic balance of sweet and sour, the **amaretto** sour combines rich almond liqueur with fresh **lemon juice** for a smooth, slightly nutty cocktail with a bright citrus edge. Soft, approachable, and dangerously drinkable, it is traditionally garnished with a **cherry** for a touch of fruit sweetness.
cocktail.27.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **amaretto** and 30 ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with 3 maraschino cherries and an **orange** slice.

cocktail.28.description: A refreshing, bittersweet twist on the classic paloma, combining the herbal complexity of **Amaro Nonino** with crisp **tequila** and bright **grapefruit**, topped with sparkling soda for a long, balanced and highly drinkable cocktail.
cocktail.28.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **tequila blanco**, 22.5 ml of **Amaro Nonino**, 30 ml of **grapefruit juice**, 30 ml of **lime juice**, 5 ml of **simple syrup**, 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and 10 ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled collins glass.
5. Garnish with a **grapefruit** slice.

Garnished with **orange**.

2. Add 45 ml of **tequila blanco**, 90 ml of **orange juice**, and 5 ml of **simple syrup**.

cocktail.30.name: American Trilogy
cocktail.30.description: A bold yet balanced **whiskey**-forward cocktail combining **applejack**, **rye whiskey**, and **demerara sugar syrup**. It offers a crisp **apple** note, spicy rye backbone, and rich caramel sweetness, finished with an expressive citrus garnish.
cocktail.30.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **applejack**, 30 ml of **rye whiskey**, 10 ml of **demerara sugar syrup** and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

4. Garnish with an **orange** slice, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **apricot brandy**, and 30 ml of **calvados**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail.35.name: Angel's Tit
cocktail.35.description: A classic creamy layered shooter made with **crème de cacao brown**, maraschino liqueur, and fresh **cream**. Sweet, silky, and dessert-like, with a visual contrast of dark **chocolate** and white **cream**, traditionally garnished with a **cherry** on top.
cocktail.35.instructions:
1. Chill a shooter glass to help keep the layers well defined.
2. Carefully pour 20 ml of **crème de cacao brown** into the bottom of the glass.
3. Slowly layer 10 ml of **Luxardo maraschino** liqueur over the back of a spoon so it sits above the cacao.
4. Gently float 10 ml of **cream** on top, again using the back of a spoon to create a clean white layer.
5. Garnish with a **cherry** placed in the center of the **cream** layer.
6. Serve immediately and drink in one shot.

cocktail.36.description: A dark, spirit-forward agave cocktail where smoky **mezcal** meets the bitter-sweet complexity of **Punt e Mes** and the lush **cherry** richness of **Cherry Heering**. Deep, aromatic, and slightly brooding, this drink is layered with herbal bitterness, gentle sweetness, and lingering smoke. Designed for slow sipping and quiet contemplation, it is finished with a **maraschino cherry** for a subtle, nostalgic touch.
cocktail.36.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **mezcal**, 22.5 ml of **Punt e Mes**, 15 ml of **Cherry Heering**, and a dash of **absinthe**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktail.58.name: Bad Word
cocktail.58.description: A bold and layered **gin** cocktail where London dry **gin**, **green Chartreuse** and **Aperol** collide with fresh citrus. Herbal, bitter and bright at the same time, it’s a complex, structured drink with a long, slightly medicinal finish, lifted by **orange** oils.
cocktail.58.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **green Chartreuse**, 30 ml of **Aperol** or **Gran Classico**, and 30 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.59.name: Bahama Mama
cocktail.59.description: A classic caribbean-style cocktail combining **white rum**, **coconut rum**, and **cherry brandy** with **pineapple** and **orange** juices for a smooth, fruity, and sun-soaked tropical experience.
cocktail.59.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **coconut rum**, 15 ml of **cherry brandy**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, 60 ml of **orange juice**, 60 ml of **pineapple juice**, and 10 ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a slice of **pineapple**.

cocktail.60.name: Bali Rum Trader
cocktail.60.description: A lush, tropical rum cocktail inspired by southeast asian flavours. **White rum** forms a clean, crisp base, while **Pisang Ambon** brings sweet **banana** depth and **pineapple juice** adds bright acidity. the result is a smooth, aromatic drink that balances fruitiness with gentle strength, finished with a playful **banana** garnish.
cocktail.60.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **white rum**, 25 ml of **Pisang Ambon**, and 25 ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **banana**.

cocktail.61.description: The bali trader is a vibrant, exotic cocktail characterized by its tropical fusion of **banana** and **pineapple** flavours.
cocktail.61.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **vodka**, 25 ml of **banana liqueur green**, and 25 ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **banana** slice.

cocktail.62.name: Bamboo Classic
cocktail.62.description: A refined, low-ABV classic that showcases the dry, nutty character of sherry balanced with herbal vermouth and bright **orange bitters**. Elegant, crisp, and quietly complex, with a refreshing citrus lift from the **lemon** garnish.
cocktail.62.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **Fino sherry**, 50 ml of **dry vermouth**, 2 dashes of **orange bitters**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
5. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.63.name: Bamboo Modern
cocktail.63.description: A modern, aromatic twist on the classic bamboo cocktail. Dry sherry forms the backbone, layered with both red and **dry vermouth** for herbal depth, while fresh citrus brightens the profile. Balanced, complex, and elegantly bittersweet, finished with an expressive **orange** garnish.
cocktail.63.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Amontillado sherry**, 15 ml of **red vermouth**, 15 ml of **dry vermouth**, 15 ml of **bianco vermouth**, and a dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink, garnish, and serve.

cocktail.64.name: Banana Calling
cocktail.64.description: A bright and aromatic **gin** sour balancing botanical **gin**, dry sherry and ripe **banana liqueur** with fresh citrus and a subtle touch of sweetness for a crisp yet tropical sip.
cocktail.64.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **gin**, 10 ml of **Amontillado sherry**, 15 ml of **banana liqueur**, 20 ml of **lemon juice**, and 10 ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of **banana** or express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.65.name: Banana Colada
cocktail.65.description: A creamy tropical cocktail combining **white rum**, **coconut syrup**, and **banana liqueur** for a smooth, sweet, and beach-style flavour profile.
cocktail.65.instructions:
1. Add 150 g of **ice**, 60 ml of **white rum**, 15 ml of **banana liqueur**, 30 ml of **coconut syrup**, and 120 ml of **pineapple juice** to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and slightly frothy.
3. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass filled with fresh **ice**.
4. Garnish with a **banana** slice, a **pineapple** wedge, or a **cherry** and serve immediately.

cocktail.66.name: Banana Daiquiri
cocktail.66.description: A smooth and tropical twist on the classic daiquiri, combining **white rum** with ripe **banana** and fresh **lime juice**. the natural sweetness of **banana** balances the sharp citrus, creating a creamy, refreshing cocktail with a bright caribbean character.
cocktail.66.instructions:
1. Add 45 ml of **white rum**, 20 ml of **lime juice**, 5 ml of **simple syrup**, and a peeled **banana** to a blender.
2. Add 150 g of **ice**.
3. Blend until smooth and creamy with no large **ice** chunks remaining.
4. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wheel and serve immediately.

1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add a **banana**, 50 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **coconut syrup**, and 100 ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry**.

cocktail.69.description: A bright and tropical non-alcoholic cocktail with ripe **banana** sweetness and a fresh, fruity character. Light, refreshing, and perfect for warm weather or as a fun, alcohol-free treat.
cocktail.69.instructions:
1. Add a **banana**, a **peach**, 150 ml of **orange juice**, and 150 g of **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Garnish with a **banana** slice or citrus wedge and serve immediately.

cocktail.70.name: Bananarama
cocktail.70.description: A bananarama cocktail is a tropical, fruit-forward drink that typically features **crème de banane** or purée as its primary flavour. Because it is a modern creation, recipes vary significantly depending on the desired profile.
cocktail.70.instructions:
1. Muddle 3 slices of **banana** with 30 ml of **cachaça** and 20 ml of **aged rum** in the base of a shaker.
2. Add 15 ml of **crème de banane**, 10 ml of **Fino Sherry**, 5 ml of **corn syrup**, 5 ml of **lime juice**, and a pinch of **salt**.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Garnish with a slice of **banana**.

cocktail.71.description: This mild, sweet and creamy shot is named after a female spirit in Irish and Celtic folklore, who foretells the death of a family member of the person who hears her wailing screams. This recipe is for 3 shots.
cocktail.71.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **crème de banane**, 45 ml of **crème de cacao white**, and 45 ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktail.72.description: A smooth, dessert-style cocktail combining **vodka**, white crème de cacao, and **milk**. Sweet, creamy, and softly chocolatey, barbara is an indulgent after-dinner drink with a gentle kick.
cocktail.72.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **vodka**, 22.5 ml of **crème de cacao white**, and 45 ml of **milk**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **cocoa powder** and a pinch of **chocolate**.

1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **gold rum**, 15 ml of **Galliano**, 60 ml of **pineapple juice**, and 15 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Top with 45 ml of **sparkling wine**.

cocktail.74.name: Basil Julep
cocktail.74.description: A bold, spirit-forward twist on the classic julep, where fresh **basil** replaces **mint** to bring deep herbal notes and a slightly peppery aroma. Rich **bourbon** forms the backbone, creating a smooth yet powerful cocktail that is both refreshing and complex. Garnished with fragrant **basil** for an elegant, aromatic finish.
cocktail.74.instructions:
1. Add fresh **basil** leaves and **simple syrup** to a rocks glass.
2. Gently muddle the **basil** to release its essential oils and aroma without shredding the leaves.
3. Pour in the **bourbon** and fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
4. Stir gently to combine.
5. Top with more crushed **ice** to form a small dome.
6. Garnish with a fresh **basil** sprig and serve immediately.

cocktail.75.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **cachaça**, 60 ml of **coconut water**, 30 ml of **condensed milk**, and 7.5 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **lime**.

cocktail.76.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **vodka**, 60 ml of **pineapple juice**, and 90 ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge and 3 maraschino cherries.

cocktail.77.description: Created in 2014 by Tom Macy at the iconic Clover Club in Brooklyn, this is a spirit-forward, complex riff on the Manhattan. It is noted for its use of prune brandy, which adds a deep, stone-fruit sweetness that balances the spicy rye.
cocktail.77.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **rye whiskey**, 15 ml of **dry vermouth**, 15 ml of **Benedictine**, 7.5 ml of **plum brandy**, 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.

cocktail.78.name: Beach Blonde
cocktail.78.description: A creamy, tropical indulgence that marries the velvety texture of **egg liqueur** with the bold heat of **overproof rum**. Balanced by fresh **banana** and a splash of citrus, this long drink is a decadent treat reminiscent of a golden sunset on the coast.
cocktail.78.instructions:
1. Peel the fresh **banana** and place it into a shaker.
2. Muddle the **banana** thoroughly until it reaches a smooth, puree-like consistency.
3. Add 90 ml of **egg liqueur**, 30 ml of **overproof rum**, and 90 ml of **orange juice** into the shaker.
4. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain the mixture into a highball glass filled with fresh **ice**.
7. Garnish with a **banana** slice and serve immediately.

1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **honey syrup**, 25 ml of **lemon juice**, and 25 ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail.80.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Everclear**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 30 ml of **honey syrup**, and 45 ml of **prosecco**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

2. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve to remove pulp if desired.
3. Pour 60 ml of the **peach purée** into a chilled flute glass.

cocktail.85.description: A vibrant non-alcoholic smash with muddled berries, **lime juice**, and sparkling **kombucha**.

1. Muddle 4 **blackberry** and 2 **strawberry** with 10 ml of **honey syrup** in a shaker.
2. Add 15 ml of **lime juice** and **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Top with 120 ml of **kombucha**.

1. Add 6 **raspberry**, 6 **blueberry**, and 15 ml of **simple syrup** to a shaker and muddle.
2. Add 20 ml of **lemon juice** and 130 g of **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

cocktail.87.description: A refreshing berry spritz with bright fruit notes, sparkling wine, and a light soda finish.
cocktail.87.instructions:
1. Muddle 40 g of **berries** with 20 ml of **lime juice** in a rocks glass.
2. Add **ice** and pour in the **prosecco**.

cocktail.89.name: Bijou
cocktail.89.description: First described in harry johnson's book 'bartender's manual', this herbal cocktail is a classic from the late 1800s. the original recipe had equal parts **gin**, Chartreuse and vermouth, but it was adapted because many found that the Chartreuse was too dominant.
cocktail.89.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **red vermouth**, 20 ml of **green Chartreuse**, and a dash of **orange bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktail.92.instructions:

5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

cocktail.100.name: Bloody Bull
cocktail.100.description: A savoury, Bloody Mary-style highball that combines **vodka**, **tomato juice**, and beef bouillon with spice and umami depth.
cocktail.100.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker tin with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **vodka**, 50 ml of **beef bouillon**, 50 ml of **tomato juice**, 5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, a dash of **lemon juice**, 3 dashes of **Worcestershire sauce**, a pinch of **celery salt**, a pinch of **black pepper**, and 2 pinches of **salt**.
3. Add plenty of **ice** to the tin with the ingredients.
4. Hold a second empty tin below and slightly to the side of the first tin.
5. Pour the cocktail in a long, controlled stream from the first tin into the second tin to aerate and chill it.
6. Pour the liquid back into the first tin in the same way.
7. Repeat the back-and-forth throw 5 times.
8. Strain into a highball glass filled with **ice**.
9. Garnish with an **olive**.

cocktail.101.name: Bloody Mary
cocktail.101.description: A savoury **vodka** cocktail with **tomato juice**, spices, and a peppery bite.
cocktail.101.instructions:
1. In a mixing tin, add 45 ml of **vodka**, 90 ml of **tomato juice**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, 2 dashes of **worcestershire sauce**, 2 dashes of **Tabasco**, a pinch of **celery salt**, and a pinch of **black pepper**.
2. Add plenty of **ice** to the tin with the ingredients.
3. Hold the second empty tin below and slightly to the side of the first one.
4. Pour the cocktail in a long, controlled stream from the first tin into the second tin.
Let the liquid fall through the air— this aerates the drink and chills it gently.
5. Pour the liquid back into the first tin in the same way.
6. Repeat this back-and-forth “throw” 5 times.
The goal is to chill and lightly dilute the drink without over-diluting or bruising it.
7. Strain into a highball glass.
8. Garnish with a **celery** stalk and a **lemon** wedge.

Its signature look comes from adding droplets of **cream** to layered spirits, which then "curdle" slightly or sink to form white tendrils that resemble jellyfish tentacles.

cocktail.113.instructions:
1. Select and pre-heat a Toddy glass.
2. Pour 25 ml of **amaretto**, 25 ml of **Grand Marnier**, and 150 ml of hot **black tea** into the pre-warmed glass.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Express oils from a **lemon** zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
5. Garnish with 1 **cinnamon** stick.

cocktail.114.name: BMW
cocktail.114.description: The name is an acronym for **Baileys**, **Malibu rum**, and **whiskey**.
cocktail.114.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Baileys**, 45 ml of **Malibu rum**, and 45 ml of **whiskey**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktail.115.name: Bobby Burns
cocktail.115.description: A complex **whiskey** cocktail where **Scotch whisky**, **red vermouth**, **Benedictine** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured.
cocktail.115.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Scotch whisky**, 45 ml of **red vermouth**, and 22.5 ml of **Benedictine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel.

cocktail.116.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **white rum**, 20 ml of **lemon juice**, 10 ml of **orange juice**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.

cocktail.117.name: Bombardino
cocktail.117.description: A rich, creamy **brandy** drink featuring **cognac**, **advocaat**, **whipped cream**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktail.117.instructions:
1. Warm 120 ml of **egg liqueur (advocaat)** in a small saucepan over low heat until hot but not boiling.
2. Add 60 ml of **cognac** (or **brandy**) and stir gently to combine.
3. Pour into a pre-warmed heat-resistant glass or mug.
4. Top with 60 ml of **whipped cream**.
5. Garnish with 1 pinch of **cinnamon** (optional: add 1 pinch of **cocoa powder**).

cocktail.118.name: Bombardino Calimero
cocktail.118.description: A rich, creamy **brandy** drink featuring **cognac**, **advocaat**, **espresso**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktail.118.instructions:
1. Warm the **egg liqueur (advocaat)** and **espresso** together in a small saucepan over low heat until hot but not boiling.
2. Add the **cognac** to a heat-safe cup.
3. Pour the hot **egg liqueur (advocaat)**-**espresso** mixture over the **cognac**.
4. Stir gently to combine.
5. Top with **whipped cream**.
6. Finish with a dusting of **cinnamon** and optional **cocoa powder**, then serve immediately.

cocktail.119.name: Bombardino Pirata
cocktail.119.description: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring **gold rum**, **advocaat**, **whipped cream**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktail.119.instructions:
1. Heat the liqueur: pour the **egg liqueur** into a small saucepan. Heat it over medium-low heat until hot but not boiling (boiling may cause the **egg** base to curdle).
2. Combine: in a heat-safe glass or small mug, add the rum.
3. Pour the hot **egg liqueur** over the rum.
4. Stir gently to combine.
5. Garnish: top with a generous dollop of **whipped cream**.
6. Finish: sprinkle **cocoa powder** or **cinnamon** on top and serve immediately while hot.

cocktail.125.description: A citrusy **brandy** cocktail with curaçao, maraschino, and **bitters** served in a **sugar**-crusted glass.
cocktail.125.instructions:
1. Rim a coupe glass with sugar (moisten the outside edge with water and dip into sugar).
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 45 ml of **cognac**, 7.5 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, 15 ml of **orange curaçao**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **simple syrup**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.

5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass rimmed with **lemon juice** and caster **sugar**.
6. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.127.name: Brandy Eggnog
cocktail.127.description: A rich, creamy **brandy** drink featuring **brandy**, **milk**, **egg**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **nutmeg**.
cocktail.127.instructions:
1. Pour 40 ml of **brandy**, 50 ml of **milk**, 10 ml of **simple syrup**, and an **egg yolk** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
6. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg** and a **cinnamon** stick.

cocktail.141.instructions:
For 3 cocktails:
1. Add 90 ml of **dark rum**, 90 ml of **coffee liqueur**, 90 ml of **crème de cacao**, 180 ml of **cream** of coconut, 180 ml of **milk**, and 150 g of **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend on high until smooth, frothy, and milkshake-like (typically 10–25 seconds).
3. Pour into chilled shot glasses or a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Top with a sprinkle of freshly grated **nutmeg** and 3 **maraschino cherries**.

cocktail.143.instructions:
1. Підготуйте келих: обваляйте половину краю чарки для шоту в гарячому **шоколадному сиропі**, потім обваляйте ту саму половину в подрібнених цукерках «Butterfinger».
2. Налийте 15 мл Kahlúa в чарку для шоту.
3. Додайте 15 мл **ірискового лікеру** поверх Kahlúa.
4. Обережно налийте 15 мл **Baileys**.
5. Додайте ще подрібнених цукерок «Butterfinger».

1. Muddle 3 peeled and pitted lychees into a cocktail shaker.
2. Add the **coconut liqueur**, **strawberry liqueur**, and **pineapple juice** into the shaker.

cocktail.166.description: A rich, creamy **vodka** drink featuring **vodka vanilla**, **Cherry Heering**, **crème de cacao white**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **maraschino cherry**.
cocktail.166.instructions:
1. Pour 30 ml of **vodka vanilla**, 15 ml of **Cherry Heering**, 15 ml of **crème de cacao white**, 30 ml of **cream**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktail.170.name: Chocolate Espresso Martini
cocktail.170.description: A spirit-forward **vodka** cocktail showcasing **vodka**, **coffee liqueur**, **espresso**—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with **chocolate syrup**.
cocktail.170.instructions:
1. Dip the rim of a martini glass into **chocolate syrup**, then into **cocoa powder** or **chocolate** shavings.
2. Swirl **chocolate syrup** around the inside of the glass and place it in the freezer for 5-10 minutes.
3. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
4. Add 45 ml of **vodka**, 30 ml of **coffee liqueur**, 45 ml of **espresso**, and 30 ml of **crème de cacao white**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into the chilled martini glass.
7. Garnish with 3 **coffee beans**.

cocktail.172.description: A rich twist on the classic Negroni, keeping its bittersweet aperitif profile while adding white cacao and **chocolate bitters**.
cocktail.172.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 22.5 ml of **Punt e Mes**, 22.5 ml of **strucchi bitter**, 7.5 ml of **crème de cacao white**, and 3 dashes of **chocolate bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.173.description: A layered shooter that uses different liqueur densities to create distinct, visible layers.
cocktail.173.instructions:
1. Pour the **grenadine** into the glass first.
2. Gently pour the **coffee liqueur** over the back of a bar spoon to keep it separate.
3. Finish by layering the **Irish cream** on top using the same spoon technique.

cocktail.174.name: Christmas Velvet Alexander
cocktail.174.description: A luxurious festive delight that pairs the velvety texture of **egg liqueur** with the botanical bite of **gin** and the dry elegance of **Fino sherry**. Perfectly balanced, creamy, and topped with aromatic **nutmeg**, it is the ultimate holiday dessert cocktail.
cocktail.174.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **egg liqueur**, 45 ml of **gin**, and 22.5 ml of **Fino sherry**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Grate **nutmeg** over the top to garnish.

2. Add 60 ml of **orange juice**, 60 ml of **pineapple juice**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, and 10 ml of **grenadine**.

cocktail.178.name: Clover Club
cocktail.178.description: A pre-prohibition **gin** sour coloured with **raspberry syrup** and bound with **egg white**.
cocktail.178.instructions:
1. Pour 45 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **raspberry syrup**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
6. Garnish with a **strawberry**.

cocktail.179.name: Cold Blooded
cocktail.179.description: A sophisticated herbal twist on a fruit sour, blending the rich **orange** notes of **Grand Marnier** with tart cranberry and fresh **lemon**. Infused with aromatic **rosemary**, this cocktail offers a crisp, vibrant, and perfectly balanced flavour profile that is both refreshing and complex.
cocktail.179.instructions:
1. Place the first **rosemary** sprig and **lemon juice** into a cocktail shaker and muddle gently to release the aromatic oils.
2. Add **Grand Marnier**, **cranberry juice**, and **rich simple syrup** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with the remaining fresh sprig of **rosemary** and serve immediately.

cocktail.203.description: A complex **whiskey** cocktail where **Scotch whisky**, **gin**, **Punt e Mes** meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with **lemon**.

1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Scotch whisky**, 30 ml of **gin**, 22.5 ml of **Punt e Mes**, 7.5 ml of **Benedictine**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.

5. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.207.description: A bright agave spirit sour balancing **tequila blanco**, **red wine** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with **lime**.
cocktail.207.instructions:
1. If you prefer a salted rim, rub the edge of a margarita glass with a **lime** wedge and dip it in **salt**.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 45 ml of **tequila blanco**, 30 ml of **lime juice**, and 20 ml of **simple syrup**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine-strain into a chilled glass.
6. Carefully float 15 ml of **red wine** on top.
7. Garnish with a **lime** slice.

cocktail.208.description: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring **aged rum**, **coffee liqueur**, **banana liqueur**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **banana**.
cocktail.208.instructions:
1. Add 60 ml of **aged rum**, 30 ml of **coffee liqueur**, 30 ml of **banana liqueur**, 60 ml of **cream**, 1 peeled **banana**, and about 150 g of crushed **ice** to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Pour into a chilled glass.
4. Optionally drizzle 5 ml of **chocolate syrup** inside the glass.
5. Garnish with a **banana** slice on the rim.

cocktail.218.description: A bright **gin** sour balancing **gin**, **mint**, **cucumber** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktail.218.instructions:
1. Place the **cucumber** slices and **simple syrup** in a cocktail shaker. Muddle thoroughly to extract the juice.
2. Drop in the **mint** leaves and muddle gently.
3. Add **gin** and **lime juice**. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.
6. Garnish with a thin **cucumber** wheel on the surface or a fresh **mint** sprig.

You can also opt for a party punch recipe by scaling the ingredients in this electric **lemonade** recipe.
cocktail.221.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.

cocktail.231.name: Fergroni
cocktail.231.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward twist on the classic Negroni. This cocktail elegantly balances the botanical notes of **gin** with the dark, bittersweet complexity of **Punt e Mes** and the herbal depth of **strucchi bitter**, resulting in a rich and aromatic sipping experience.
cocktail.231.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **Punt e Mes**, 20 ml of **strucchi bitter**, and a **lemon** peel.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktail.232.description: Argentina's favorite mix of fernet and **cola** over **ice**.
cocktail.232.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **Fernet Branca** and 120 ml of **cola**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktail.233.description: Perhaps the most famous variation of the classic "Last Word" cocktail created by Phil Ward, with **rye whiskey** instead of **gin** and **lemon juice** instead of **lime juice**.
cocktail.233.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 20 ml of rye whisky, 20 ml of **green Chartreuse**, 20 ml of maraschino liqueur and 20 ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.234.description: A fiery party shooter that blends **white rum**, **Goldschläger**, and a dash of **Tabasco** for a spicy-sweet kick.
cocktail.234.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Pour 60 ml of **white rum**, 60 ml of **Goldschläger**, and 3 dashes of **Tabasco**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktail.235.description: A bright **gin** sour balancing **gin**, maraschino liqueur, **dry vermouth** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktail.235.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 40 ml of **gin**, 25 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, 25 ml of **dry vermouth**, 15 ml of **Aperol**, and 25 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry** and a peel of **orange**.

cocktail.236.description: Although dr pepper is not one of ingredients of this cocktail, it is claimed that it tastes like dr pepper.
cocktail.236.instructions:
1. Fill a pint glass halfway with **beer**.
2. Add the **amaretto** to a shot glass and top with the rum.
3. Set the rum on fire and very carefully drop the shot glass into the **beer**.

cocktail.237.name: Flaming Volcano
cocktail.237.description:
Flaming volcano is a large tropical group cocktail typically made with rum, **brandy**, **pineapple juice**, **orange juice**, and orgeat syrup.
A flaming volcano is usually served to a group of two or more people with a set of very long straws to facilitate convenient group sipping from a comfortable distance and for safety.
cocktail.237.instructions:
1. Add 150 g of crushed **ice** to a blender.
2. Add 30 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **brandy**, and 30 ml of **dark rum**.
3. Add 60 ml of **orange juice**, 60 ml of **pineapple juice**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, and 60 ml of **almond (orgeat) syrup**.
4. Blend until smooth.
5. Pour into a chilled volcano bowl.

cocktail.238.description: A strong and really invigorating shot.
cocktail.238.instructions:
1. Pour 20 ml of **sambuca** into a shooter.
2. Carefully pour 25 ml of **tequila blanco** on top of the **sambuca**.
3. Add a dash of **Tabasco**.

cocktail.239.name: Flip #27
cocktail.239.description: A sophisticated and velvety dessert cocktail that masterfully blends the richness of **port** with the deep notes of **aged rum**. the addition of **raspberry syrup** and **heavy cream** creates a luxurious, smooth texture, while the whole **egg** provides the classic frothy 'flip' finish.
cocktail.239.instructions:
1. Combine **port**, **aged rum**, **raspberry syrup**, **heavy cream**, and the **egg** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture into a chilled goblet glass to ensure a smooth texture.
6. Garnish with fresh raspberries on top.

cocktail.240.name: Fluffy Duck Classic
cocktail.240.description: Light, creamy and easy drinking. **Gin** prevents this particular duck from being too fluffy.
cocktail.240.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **egg liqueur (advocaat)**, 20 ml of **orange liqueur**, and 20 ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a tall glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 30 ml of chilled **soda water** and stir gently.
6. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktail.241.description: A stronger version of the cocktail. If you want something smoother, check out the 'fluffy duck 2'.
cocktail.241.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **egg liqueur (advocaat)**, 30 ml of **triple sec**, and 30 ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into an **ice**-filled glass.
5. Top with 30 ml of cold **lemonade**.
6. Garnish with a **strawberry**.

cocktail.242.name: Fort Point
cocktail.242.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward riff on the Manhattan. This cocktail combines the spicy bite of rye whisky with the bitter-sweet complexity of **Punt e Mes** and the herbal **honey** notes of **Benedictine**. It is a deep, aromatic, and perfectly balanced drink meant to be savored slowly.
cocktail.242.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **rye whiskey**, 15 ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 7.5 ml of **Benedictine**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktail.243.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, and 15 ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled flute glass.
5. Top with 60 ml of **champagne**.

cocktail.244.description: Equal-parts blend of **cognac** and **amaretto** served over **ice**.
cocktail.244.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **cognac** and 45 ml of **amaretto**.
3. Stir gently to combine.

cocktail.245.name: French Dew Sour
cocktail.245.description: An elegant and sophisticated twist on the classic sour, the French dew sour combines the deep, oaky notes of **cognac** with the herbal complexity of **Benedictine**. Infused with fresh **rosemary** and a hint of **black pepper**, this cocktail offers a creamy texture thanks to the **egg white**, balanced by a bright citrus finish and a touch of warm **vanilla**.
cocktail.245.instructions:
1. Lightly muddle the fresh **rosemary** and **black pepper** in the bottom of a cocktail shaker.
2. Add the **cognac**, **Benedictine**, **lemon juice**, **rich simple syrup**, **egg white**, **Angostura bitters**, and **vanilla extract**.
3. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
4. Add **ice**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
7. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and an extra crack of **black pepper** if desired.

cocktail.246.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **vodka**, 15 ml of **raspberry liqueur**, and 15 ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail.247.name: French Pearl
cocktail.247.description: Created by Audrey Saunders, this modern classic is a sophisticated **gin** sour that bridges the gap between a southside and a **pastis**-heavy aperitif. the **anise** notes from the **pastis** beautifully complement the fresh **mint** and botanical **gin**, resulting in a complex, refreshing, and herbal cocktail.
cocktail.247.instructions:
1. Gently muddle the fresh **mint** leaves with the **rich simple syrup** in a cocktail shaker to release the essential oils.
2. Add **gin**, **pastis**, and fresh **lime juice** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a chilled coupe glass to remove **mint** fragments.
6. Garnish with a **lime** wheel and a fresh **mint** sprig.

cocktail.248.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward twist on the classic purgatory. This French-inspired version balances the boldness of **cognac** with the herbal sweetness of **yellow Chartreuse** and the bitter depth of **Punt e Mes**, finished with a subtle smoky whisper of **Islay Scotch whisky**.
cocktail.248.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40 ml of **cognac**, 10 ml of **yellow Chartreuse**, 20 ml of **Punt e Mes**, and 5 ml of **Islay Scotch whisky**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.249.name: Fresh Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktail.249.description: A vibrant and sophisticated twist on the classic daiquiri. This cocktail combines the lush sweetness of muddled strawberries with crisp **white rum** and zesty **lime**, enhanced by a subtle pinch of **black pepper** and **salt** to elevate the fruity notes.
cocktail.249.instructions:
1. Place 7 fresh strawberries into a shaker and muddle thoroughly to release their juices.
2. Add 60 ml of **white rum**, 22.5 ml of fresh **lime juice**, 15 ml of **rich simple syrup**, a halfъ-pinch of **black pepper**, and a half-pinch of **salt** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a chilled coupe glass to remove **strawberry** seeds and pulp.
6. Garnish with a fresh **strawberry** on the rim.

cocktail.250.description: This cocktail features a striking blue color from **blue curaçao** layered with creamy sweetness.
cocktail.250.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **tequila blanco**, 30 ml of **blue curaçao**, 15 ml of **crème de cacao white**, and 15 ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with 2 **maraschino cherries**.

cocktail.251.description: A variation of the popular daiquiri cocktail.
cocktail.251.instructions:
1. Add 60 ml of **aged rum**, 22.5 ml of **lime juice**, 22.5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 7.5 ml of **Luxardo maraschino** to a blender and blend briefly without **ice** on a slow setting.
2. Add about 150 g of crushed **ice** and blend again until smooth.
3. Pour into a chilled glass.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge on the rim, skewered with a **maraschino cherry**.
5. Serve with a straw.

cocktail.252.description: A frozen-style cocktail for sharing, blending fresh strawberries, citrus, and light rum into a balanced, fruit-forward drink.
cocktail.252.instructions:
1. Place the frozen strawberries and **sugar** into a high-speed blender.
2. Pour in the **white rum**, **lemon juice**, and **lime juice**.
3. Add the **ice** to the blender container.
4. Blend on high speed until the mixture reaches a smooth, slushy consistency.
5. Pour the punch into a chilled glasses.
6. Garnish each glass with a fresh **strawberry**.

cocktail.253.description: The fuzzy navel is a classic 1980s cocktail that combines the fruity sweetness of **peach** with the citrus tang of **orange**. It is one of the simplest cocktails to make, typically requiring only two main ingredients.
cocktail.253.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 90 ml of **peach schnapps** and 90 ml of **orange juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge and a **mint** sprig.

cocktail.256.description: A sophisticated tropical delight that balances the depth of **aged rum** and **cognac** with the bright acidity of **lime** and the lush sweetness of **pineapple**. This cocktail offers a complex, velvety texture with a refreshing finish, perfect for an upscale beach vibe.
cocktail.256.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **aged rum**, 30 ml of **cognac**, 22.5 ml of **lime juice**, 10 ml of **pineapple syrup**, 5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and a dash of **bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail.257.name: Genever Fruit Cup
cocktail.257.description: A refreshing and bubbly long drink that showcases the malty notes of **oude genever** paired with citrusy curaçao and herbal **red vermouth**. Topped with **ginger ale** and **cola**, it's a botanical, fruit-forward sparkler perfect for social sipping.
cocktail.257.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 25 ml of **oude genever**, 15 ml of **orange curaçao**, 25 ml of **red vermouth**, 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, 50 ml of **ginger ale**, and 50 ml of **cola** to a Collins glass.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice, a **lemon** slice, 4 **strawberry** slices, a **mint** sprig, and a **borage** sprig.

cocktail.258.name: Gennaro's Sidecar
cocktail.258.description: Gennaro's Sidecar is an Italian-inspired twist on the classic **Sidecar** cocktail, created by chef Gennaro Contaldo (mentor to Jamie Oliver). the signature addition of **limoncello** adds a sweeter, vibrant citrus layer to the traditional **cognac** and **triple sec** base.
cocktail.258.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **cognac**, 22.5 ml of **triple sec**, 15 ml of **limoncello**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, and 10 ml of **water**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.259.description: A strong **gin** martini garnished with a silverskin onion.
cocktail.259.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin** and 30 ml of **dry vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with 3 silver onions.

cocktail.260.description: A classic **gin**-based cocktail with a long history.
cocktail.260.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 15 ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktail.261.description: This cocktail's name speaks for itself. Bright, strong and good for adventure. It may be prepared as a shot.
cocktail.261.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 30 ml of **orange juice** and a dash of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktail.262.name: Gin & Tonic
cocktail.262.description: A timeless and refreshing highball cocktail that perfectly balances the botanical notes of **gin** with the crisp bitterness of **tonic** **water**. This effervescent drink is elevated by a bright citrus aroma, making it a sophisticated yet simple choice for any occasion.
cocktail.262.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin** and 120 ml of **tonic** to a highball glass.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktail.263.instructions:
1. Muddle **basil** and **rich simple syrup** in a shaker.
2. Add **gin**, **lemon juice**, and **ice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Garnish with a **basil** leaf.

cocktail.264.name: Gin Fizz
cocktail.264.instructions:
1. Pour 60 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
6. Top with 60 ml of soda.
7. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktail.265.name: Gin Rickey
cocktail.265.description: This classic cocktail is considered the best of the 'rickey' group of drinks, which are made from a base spirit, **lime juice** and soda.
cocktail.265.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **lime juice**, and 100 ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lime** wedge.

cocktail.266.name: Gin Sour
cocktail.266.description: The **gin** sour is a classic 'sour' cocktail. It can be served in a cocktail glass or a rocks glass.
cocktail.266.instructions:
1. Pour 60 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **simple syrup** and an optional **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with either a **lemon** slice and **maraschino cherry** or with several drops of **Angostura bitters**.

cocktail.267.description: A zesty alcohol-free spritz combining spicy **ginger ale**, fresh **lemon juice**, and a touch of **honey syrup**.
cocktail.267.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 40 ml of **lemon juice** and 20 ml of **honey syrup**.
3. Top with 80 ml of **ginger ale**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** wheel.

1. In a highball glass, muddle half a **peach** with 15 ml of **lemon juice**.
2. Fill the glass with **ice**.
3. Add 120 ml of **ginger ale**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with 2 **peach** slices.

cocktail.269.description: The gladiator cocktail is a drop shot like the Irish slammer. You pour the liqueurs into a shot glass, drop that glass into a larger glass filled with the mixers and "shoot" the entire drink.
cocktail.269.instructions:
1. Add 15 ml of **amaretto**, 15 ml of **peach schnapps**, 60 ml of **7-Up**, and 60 ml of **orange juice** to a pub glass.
2. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

2. Add 60 ml of **Scotch whisky**, 20 ml of **amaretto**, and 2 dashes of **bitters**.

cocktail.272.description: A variation of the "**whiskey** sour" with **honey** instead of **sugar** syrup.
cocktail.272.instructions:

2. Add 60 ml of **bourbon**, 20 ml of **lemon juice** and 20 ml of **honey syrup**(3:1).

4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

cocktail.273.name: Golden Cadillac
cocktail.273.description: The golden cadillac is a sweet, creamy, retro dessert cocktail. Created in 1952 at poor red's in el dorado, california, it became popular in the 1960s for its rich, **vanilla**-forward flavour, similar to a **brandy** alexander but with **Galliano**.
cocktail.273.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 20 ml of **Galliano**, 20 ml of crème de cacao white and 20 ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with grated **chocolate** and **nutmeg**.

2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 45 ml of **tequila blanco**, 30 ml of **Grand Marnier**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 10 ml of **agave syrup**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into the prepared glass.
6. Garnish with a **lime** wheel.

2. Add 20 ml of **crème de cacao white**, 20 ml of **crème de menthe green**, and 20 ml of **cream**.

cocktail.277.name: Greek Tragedy
cocktail.277.description: A sophisticated and vibrant wine-based sour that masterfully balances the herbal notes of **Ouzo** with the botanical depth of **red vermouth**. the addition of **raspberry liqueur** provides a lush fruity undertone, while fresh **lime juice** ensures a crisp, refreshing finish. Elegant and complex, it is a perfect modern twist on mediterranean flavours.
cocktail.277.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Ouzo**, 30 ml of **red vermouth**, 30 ml of **raspberry liqueur**, and 20 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry** and a **lime** twist.

cocktail.278.instructions:
1. Pour 15 ml of **green banana liqueur** into a shot glass first.
2. Carefully pour 10 ml of **lemon juice** over the back of a bar spoon to layer it on top of the liqueur.
3. Gently layer 20 ml of **tequila blanco** as the final top tier using the same bar spoon method.

Despite its name, it contains no tea, but offers a complex, spirit-forward profile complemented by crisp **apple juice**.

1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of bison grass **vodka**, 7.5 ml of **Pisang Ambon**, 5 ml of **crème de menthe white**, and 45 ml of **apple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a **banana** slice.

4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

2. Add 15 ml of **brandy**, 15 ml of **red vermouth**, 2 pinches of **angelica root**, and 5 ml of **gomme syrup**.

cocktail.289.description: A nutty twist on the classic **brandy** alexander. This cocktail blends the deep notes of **cognac** with rich **chocolate** and toasted hazelnut, rounded out by silky **cream** for a luxurious, dessert-like finish.
cocktail.289.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **cognac**, 15 ml of **crème de cacao**, 22.5 ml of **hazelnut liqueur**, and 22.5 ml of **cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe.
5. Add 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters** on top.
6. Garnish by grating **chocolate** over the surface.

cocktail.290.name: Hazelnut Martini
cocktail.290.description: An interesting martini variation with **Frangelico** (**hazelnut liqueur**) and cacao liqueur. If you like it mild, some recipes also suggest adding about a half shot of **cream**.
cocktail.290.instructions:
1. Prepare your martini glasses before shaking up your Martinis by gently drizzling **chocolate syrup** into a martini glass.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 60 ml of **vodka**, 15 ml of **Frangelico** and 15 ml of **white crème de cacao**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail.291.name: Hemingway Special
cocktail.291.description: A tart rum sour with **grapefruit** and maraschino liqueur.
cocktail.291.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **white rum**, 40 ml of **grapefruit juice**, 15 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 15 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.292.name: Hibiscus Cooler
cocktail.292.description: A ruby-red non-alcoholic cooler with floral **hibiscus syrup**, bright **lime juice**, and crisp **soda water**.
cocktail.292.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 40 ml of **hibiscus syrup** and 25 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Top with 100 ml of **soda water**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **lime** wheel.

cocktail.293.name: Highball
cocktail.293.description: A classic whisky highball is one of the oldest **Scotch**-based cocktails, made of just three winning elements: **Scotch whisky**, soda, and **ice**.
cocktail.293.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **Scotch whisky** and 120 ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktail.294.name: Hiroshima
cocktail.294.description: A rich, creamy spirit drink featuring **sambuca**, **Baileys**, **absinthe**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktail.294.instructions:
1. Pour 20 ml of **sambuca** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15 ml of **Baileys** and 10 ml of **absinthe**.
3. Add a few **grenadine** drops using a straw.

cocktail.295.name: Honey Badger
cocktail.295.description: A sophisticated and herbal twist on the classic **whiskey** sour. This cocktail marries the bold warmth of **bourbon** with the complex botanical notes of **yellow Chartreuse**, sharpened by a kick of **ginger** and softened by floral **honey**. a sprig of **rosemary** adds an aromatic depth that makes every sip crisp and refreshing.
cocktail.295.instructions:
1. Lightly muddle the fresh **rosemary** sprig in the bottom of a cocktail shaker to release its essential oils.
2. Add the **bourbon**, **yellow Chartreuse**, **ginger syrup**, **honey syrup**, **lemon juice**, and **lemon bitters** into the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and serve immediately.

2. Add 50 ml of **tequila blanco** and 100 ml of **orange juice**.

cocktail.298.description: A traditional hot winter drink. Some recipes suggest using warm cider instead of **water**. the **sugar** in the recipe can be substituted with **honey**.
cocktail.298.instructions:
1. Add 2 teaspoons of **butter**, a teaspoon of **sugar**, a dash of **cinnamon**, a dash of **nutmeg**, 50 ml of **dark rum**, and 100 ml of **water** to a Toddy glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish with a **lemon** slice and a **cinnamon** stick.

cocktail.299.description: A warming mix of **whiskey**, **honey**, **lemon** and hot **water**.
cocktail.299.instructions:
1. Add a teaspoon of **honey**, 45 ml of **whiskey**, a quarter of a **lemon**, and 100 ml of **boiling water** to a Toddy glass.

cocktail.300.name: Hpnotiq Breeze
cocktail.300.description: The Hpnotiq Breeze (also known as the Hypnotic Breeze) is a tropical cocktail featuring Hpnotiq, a sky-blue French liqueur made from **vodka**, **cognac**, and tropical fruit juices. the drink is known for its vibrant blue hue and refreshing, sweet-tart profile that blends passionfruit, mango, and citrus flavours.
cocktail.300.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 75 ml of **Hpnotiq**, 30 ml of **white rum**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 15 ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a hurricane or martini glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Slowly pour 15 ml of **pineapple juice** into the center to create the temporary tie-dye effect.
6. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry** and a **lime** wheel.

cocktail.301.name: Hurricane
cocktail.301.description: The hurricane is an iconic tropical cocktail that is brilliantly refreshing on a hot summer day. It is a fun rum-filled drink that includes a captivating combination of **passion fruit** and **orange** juices.
cocktail.301.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **white rum**, 60 ml of **dark rum**, 60 g of **passion fruit** puree, 30 ml of **orange juice**, 15 ml of **grenadine**, and 15 ml of **Passoa**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a hurricane glass filled with **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice and a **cherry**.

cocktail.302.name: IBA Tiki
cocktail.302.description: Fruity Tiki blend of rums, juices, and exotic syrups.
cocktail.302.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **dark rum**, 15 ml of **amaretto**, 5 ml of **Frangelico**, 5 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, 15 ml of **passion fruit syrup**, 90 ml of **pineapple juice**, 30 ml of **lime juice**, 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and a slice of **ginger**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Tiki glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple** and a **mint**.
