cocktail.303.name: Illegal
cocktail.303.description: Smoky **mezcal** balanced with herbal Chartreuse and **lime**.
cocktail.303.instructions:
1. Pour 30 ml of **mezcal**, 15 ml of **overproof rum**, 15 ml of **falernum**, a bar spoon of **Luxardo maraschino**, 22.5 ml of **lime juice**, 15 ml of **simple syrup** and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail.304.description: Scotch-based take on the improved whisky cocktail with **honey** and maraschino.
cocktail.304.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **Islay Scotch whisky**, 22.5 ml of **red vermouth**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, a teaspoon of **honey syrup**, a teaspoon of **water**, a teaspoon of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.306.description: A **gin**-based cocktail that beautifully marries the botanical notes of **gin** with the earthy aroma of **rosemary** and the tart brightness of **grapefruit**. This drink offers a perfect balance of herbal sweetness and citrus punch, making it a refreshing choice for any occasion.

3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double-strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail.313.description: The Irish Maid is a refreshing, floral "modern classic" cocktail that serves as the **Irish whiskey** variation of the Kentucky Maid (originally created by Sam Ross). It is defined by its crisp combination of muddled **cucumber**, **elderflower**, and **lemon**.

1. Muddle 2 **cucumber slices** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 60 ml of **Irish whiskey**, 15 ml of **St-Germain**, 20 ml of **lemon juice**, and 10 ml of **rich simple syrup** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.

2. Stir gently to combine.
3. Pour into a warm glass.
4. Squeeze the **orange** zest over the top of the glass to release oils, then drop the peel in.
5. Add the **cinnamon** stick and **apple** slice.

cocktail.315.name: Irish Slammer
cocktail.315.description: The Irish Slammer (traditionally known by more controversial names like the "Irish Car Bomb") is a "bomb shot" cocktail consisting of **Irish whiskey**, **Irish cream**, and **Irish stout**.
cocktail.315.instructions:
1. Pour the 360 ml of **Guinness** into a pint glass and let the foam settle.
2. Pour 15 ml of **Baileys** into a shot glass first, then layer 15 ml of **Irish whiskey** on top.
3. Drop the shot glass into the Guinness and drink immediately. If it sits too long, the cream will curdle due to the acidity of the beer.

cocktail.319.description: Early 20th Century classic of **apple brandy**, **lemon** and **grenadine**.
cocktail.319.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **calvados**, 22.5 ml of **lemon juice**, and 15 ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an **apple** slice or express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink.

cocktail.320.name: Jackie Welles
cocktail.320.description: The jackie welles is a signature cocktail from the video game cyberpunk 2077, famously ordered by the character jackie welles at the afterlife bar. In real-world bartending, the recipe is a variation of a **vodka** buck.
cocktail.320.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **vodka**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, 120 ml of **ginger beer**, a splash of **grenadine**, and a wedge of **lime**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktail.321.name: Jagertee
cocktail.321.description: Jagertee (hunter's tea) is a traditional Austrian spiced, alcoholic punch, famous as an après-ski warmer made from a blend of inländer rum, **black tea**, spices, **sugar**, and fruit essences, often prepared with hot **water** or enjoyed chilled in summer as a strong iced tea.
cocktail.321.instructions:
1. Add 240 ml of **black tea**, 240 ml of **orange juice**, 240 ml of **spiced rum**, and 240 ml of **plum brandy** to a pot.
2. Add a **cinnamon** stick, 5 **cloves**, and 2 sliced **lemons**.
3. Simmer on low-medium heat for about 5 minutes. Do not let it boil.
4. Remove from heat.
5. Add 15 ml of **honey**.
6. Stir gently to combine.
7. Strain in mugs.
8. Garnish each serving with an **orange** slice if desired.

cocktail.322.name: Jam Roly Poly
cocktail.322.description: A rich, sweet **gin** drink featuring a **raspberry** taste.
cocktail.322.instructions:
1. Pour 30 ml of **raspberry liqueur** into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15 ml of **egg liqueur** on top of the liqueur.

cocktail.323.name: Japanese Slipper
cocktail.323.description: This popular cocktail was created in 1984 by jean-paul bourguignon at mietta's restaurant in melbourne.
cocktail.323.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Midori Melon liqueur**, 45 ml of **Cointreau**, and 45 ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a wedge of **honeydew melon** and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktail.324.instructions:
1. Pour 15 ml of **grenadine** into a shooter.
2. Carefully add 15 ml of **sambuca** and 15 ml of **Southern Comfort** on top of the **grenadine**.

cocktail.325.name: Jellyfish
cocktail.325.description: A jellyfish shooter is a layered drink that uses differing liquid densities to create the visual of a jellyfish "swimming" in the glass. There are two popular versions: the traditional creamy version and the vibrant "blue jellyfish".
cocktail.325.instructions:
1. Pour 15 ml of crème de cacao white into a shooter glass.
2. Gently add 15 ml of **amaretto** on top.
3. Gently pour 15 ml of **Baileys** on top of the amaretto.
4. Add a few drops of **grenadine**.

cocktail.326.description: Sherry depth and stoned fruit flavours.
cocktail.326.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15 ml of **Fino sherry**, 15 ml of **Pedro Ximenez sherry**, 30 ml of **peach schnapps**, 30 ml of **Sauvignon Blanc**, 30 ml of **plum brandy**, and 1 dash of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

2. Add 45 ml of **gin**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **simple syrup**, and 60 ml of **soda water**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktail.328.name: Johnny Silverhand
cocktail.328.description: A johnny silverhand is a fictional cocktail from the video game cyberpunk 2077 that has been adapted into several popular real-world recipes. It is generally described as a **Tequila Old Fashioned** with a **beer** float.
cocktail.328.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **tequila añejo**, a bar spoon of **agave syrup**, 3 dashes of **Angostura bitters**, and 30 ml of **Corona**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** peel and a **chili pepper**.

cocktail.329.description: Named after the popular american candy brand.
cocktail.329.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **vodka**, 30 ml of **Midori Melon liqueur**, and 90 ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

2. Add 45 ml of **blackstrap rum**, 20 ml of **Campari**, 45 ml of **pineapple juice**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 15 ml of **demerara sugar syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktail.331.name: Jägerbomb
cocktail.331.description: A jägerbomb is a popular "bomb shot" cocktail consisting of a shot of **Jägermeister** dropped into a glass containing an energy drink, typically **Red Bull**.
cocktail.331.instructions:
1. Pour roughly half a can (approx. 125 ml) of chilled **Red Bull** into a large glass, such as a pint glass or highball.
2. Fill a standard shot glass with 45 ml of chilled **Jägermeister**.
3. Drop the shot glass directly into the larger glass.
4. Drink immediately, typically in one go.

cocktail.332.name: Kamikaze
cocktail.332.description: This popular cocktail is a variation of the original kamikaze shooter.
cocktail.332.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **vodka**, 60 ml of **triple sec**, and 15 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.
5. Garnish every shot with a small **lime** wedge.

cocktail.333.name: Kentucky Maid
cocktail.333.description: The Kentucky Maid is a refreshing, floral "modern classic" cocktail. It is defined by its crisp combination of muddled **cucumber**, **mint**, **elderflower**, and **lemon**.
cocktail.333.instructions:
1. Muddle 2 **cucumber slices** and 6 **mint leaves** in a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add 60 ml of **bourbon**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, and 20 ml of **rich simple syrup** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a thin **cucumber slice**.

cocktail.334.name: Kings County
cocktail.334.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that balances the honeyed notes of highland **Scotch whisky** with a touch of Islay smoke and herbal complexity.
cocktail.334.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Scotch Highland whisky**, 10 ml of **Islay Scotch whisky**, 10 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 10 ml of **Punt e Mes**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
5. Garnish with a **cherry**, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish as well.

cocktail.335.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **dark rum**, 30 ml of **Campari**, and 30 ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

cocktail.336.instructions:
1. Add 10 ml of **crème de cassis** and 90 ml of **white wine** to a wine glass.
2. Stir gently to combine.

cocktail.337.name: Kir Royal
cocktail.337.description: An upscale, effervescent version of the classic kir, replacing still wine with **champagne** for a celebratory and luxurious experience.
cocktail.337.instructions:
1. Add 90 ml of **champagne** and 10 ml of **crème de cassis** to a flute glass.
2. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktail.338.name: Kiwi Fruit Margarita
cocktail.338.description: This is a refreshing, tropical twist on the classic cocktail that can be prepared either blended (frozen) or shaken (on the rocks). It typically features fresh, ripe kiwis, **tequila**, **lime juice**, and a sweetener like **agave** or **simple syrup**.
cocktail.338.instructions:
1. If you prefer a salted rim, rub the edge of a margarita glass with a **lime** wedge and dip it in **salt**.
2. Cut 1 **kiwi fruit** into pieces (save a slice for garnish) and muddle it in a shaker.
3. Add 150 g of **ice**, 60 ml of **tequila reposado**, 30 ml of **triple sec**, 30 ml of **lime juice**, and 30 ml of **agave syrup**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Garnish with a **kiwi fruit** slice.

cocktail.339.name: Kiwi Fruit Martini
cocktail.339.description: A tropical-fruit Martini with muddled kiwi, citrus, and a clean **vodka** base.
cocktail.339.instructions:
1. Cut a **kiwi fruit** in half and cut an additional slice for garnish. Scoop the flesh from both halves into the base of a shaker.
2. Muddle the kiwi fruit flesh thoroughly.
3. Add 60 ml of **vodka**, 15 ml of **Strucchi Bitter**, and 5 ml of **kiwi fruit liqueur**.
4. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Fine strain into a chilled martini glass.
7. Garnish with the kiwi fruit slice.

cocktail.340.name: Ladykiller
cocktail.340.description: The very sweet and beautiful 1984 championship-winning cocktail created by Peter Roth from the Kronenhalle bar in Zürich.
cocktail.340.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **Cointreau**, 15 ml of **apricot brandy**, 60 ml of **passion fruit juice**, and 60 ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice, and a **cherry**.

cocktail.341.name: Larkwood
cocktail.341.description: The larkwood is a herbal "sour" cocktail created by bartender Jason Clapham of Clapham Cocktails. It is a modern riff on the classic Last Word, substituting **green Chartreuse** with the czech spiced herbal liqueur **Becherovka**.
cocktail.341.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 22.5 ml of **Becherovka**, 22.5 ml of **Luxardo maraschino**, and 22.5 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled glass.
5. Garnish with **lime** wheel.

cocktail.343.name: Lava Flow
cocktail.343.description: A lava flow is a visually striking hawaiian cocktail that combines a **strawberry daiquiri**-style base with a creamy **Piña Colada** top. the signature "lava" effect occurs when the denser **cream** mixture is poured over the **strawberry** base, causing the red puree to swirl upward along the sides of the glass.
cocktail.343.instructions:
1. Add 30 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **Malibu rum**, and 60 g of **strawberry** to a blender. Blend until smooth and syrupy.
2. Pour the **strawberry** mixture into a tall hurricane or highball glass.
3. Add a **banana**, 60 ml of **pineapple juice**, 60 ml of **cream** of coconut, and 150 g of **ice** to the blender. Blend until smooth and frothy.
4. Slowly pour the white mixture into the center of the glass over the **strawberry** base to create a layered effect.
5. Garnish with a **pineapple** wedge and serve.

cocktail.350.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that highlights the botanical notes of **gin** balanced by the deep, **anise**-flavored complexity of **black sambuca**. This drink is smooth, aromatic, and perfect for those who enjoy bold, herbal profiles.
cocktail.350.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin**, 7.5 ml of **black sambuca**, 5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and a stalk of **liquorice**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail.351.name: Lisbon Martini
cocktail.351.description: A refined european twist on the classic **Martini**. The rich, fruity notes of **port** wine blend seamlessly with the crispness of **gin** and the delicate floral sweetness of **St-Germain** elderflower liqueur, finished with a citrusy dash of **bitters**.
cocktail.351.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **port**, 60 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **St-Germain**, and a dash of **Bittermens Boston Bittahs**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** peel and a **chamomile flowers**.

cocktail.352.name: London Calling
cocktail.352.description: Created in 2002 in London's "Milk & Honey" bar by Chris Jepson for a magazine competition. a well-known variation is the "**Banana Calling".
cocktail.352.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **Fino sherry**, 10 ml of **lemon juice**, 10 ml of **simple syrup**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a twist of **grapefruit**.

cocktail.353.description: A variation of the long island iced tea with **cranberry juice** instead of **cola**.
cocktail.353.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 15 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **white rum**, 15 ml of **tequila blanco**, 15 ml of **vodka**, 15 ml of **orange liqueur**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, and 60 ml of **cranberry juice**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 15 ml of **vodka**, 15 ml of **tequila blanco**, 15 ml of **white rum**, 15 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **Cointreau**, 25 ml of **lemon juice**, and 30 ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Top with a splash of **Coca-Cola**.
5. Garnish with a **lemon** slice.

cocktail.355.name: Longshoreman
cocktail.355.description: A bold, spirit-forward **whiskey** drink built around **Punt e Mes**, rye whisky, and **amaro**. It is bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well-chilled in a rocks glass with a fresh **orange** twist.
cocktail.355.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 15 ml of **Punt e Mes**, 45 ml of **rye whiskey**, and 15 ml of **amaro**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.356.name: Love & Murder
cocktail.356.description: A bright and complex liqueur sour that balances the bitterness of **Campari** with the herbal notes of **green Chartreuse** and fresh **lime**. a crisp, refreshing, and vibrant cocktail.
cocktail.356.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Campari**, 30 ml of **green Chartreuse**, 30 ml of **lime juice**, 20 ml of **simple syrup**, and a dash of **salt**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail.357.name: Lovelight
cocktail.357.description: An elegant and sophisticated **brandy**-based drink. It combines the warmth of **cognac** with the spicy depth of **cinnamon** and **chocolate bitters**, rounded out by bitter and vermouth notes.
cocktail.357.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 40 ml of **cognac**, 20 ml of **strucchi bitter**, 10 ml of **red vermouth**, 5 ml of **cinnamon syrup**, and 2 dashes of **chocolate bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

cocktail.358.description: A cocktail named after lucien gaudin, a French fencer who won two gold medals in the 1924 and 1928 olympic games, named similarly to the Negroni, with the addition of **orange liqueur** and with **dry vermouth** instead of sweet vermouth.
cocktail.358.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **Cointreau**, 15 ml of **Campari**, and 15 ml of **dry vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.359.description: A popular cocktail named after lynchburg, tennessee, the hometown of the jack daniel's distillery.

2. Add 30 ml of **Jack Daniels**, 15 ml of **triple sec**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **simple syrup**, and 100 ml of **lemonade**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **lemon** wedge.

cocktail.360.description: Rum-forward Tiki classic with **orange curaçao**, **lime**, and orgeat.
cocktail.360.instructions:

2. Add 30 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **dark rum**, 15 ml of **orange curaçao**, 15 ml of almond(orgeat) syrup, 30 ml of **lime juice**, and 7.5 ml of **simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with a sprig of **mint** and a slice of **lime**.

Many variations exist, with the amount of **lime juice**, sauces and juice can be varied according to taste.

cocktail.379.name: Midori Sour
cocktail.379.description: The Midori sour is a sweet and slightly sour cocktail with a delicious melon flavour.
cocktail.379.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **Midori Melon liqueur**, 30 ml of **vodka**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, and 15 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
5. Top with 15 ml of **soda water**.
6. Garnish with a peel of **lemon** and a **cherry**.

cocktail.380.name: Milano-Torino
cocktail.380.description: Also known as "Mi-To," this cocktail was created around 1860 in a cafe in Milan, Italy. It is named after the ingredients: **Campari** is from Milan, and sweet vermouth is from Turin. With the addition of soda, this drink turns into the "Americano" cocktail, and with **gin**, it turns into the "Negroni.".
cocktail.380.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Campari** and 30 ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.381.description: Brunch favorite combining **sparkling wine** and fresh **orange juice**.
cocktail.381.instructions:
1. Add 75 ml of **orange juice** and 75 ml of **champagne** to a flute glass.
2. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

2. Add 60 ml of **advocaat**, 60 ml of **vodka**, and 15 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

1. Add **white rum**, **peach brandy**, **lime juice**, **honey syrup**, **pineapple** pieces, **mint** leaves, and **ice** to a blender.

cocktail.386.name: Mixed Berry Sangria
cocktail.386.description: A fruit-forward sangria made with **red wine**, **berries**, **orange**, and a touch of **brandy**.
cocktail.386.instructions:
1. In a large pitcher, muddle 300 g of **berries**, an **orange** (sliced), and 45 ml of **sugar**.
2. Add 750 ml of **red wine**, 90 ml of **brandy**, 180 ml of **orange juice**, and 300 g of **ice**.
3. Add 180 ml of **soda water** if you want a lighter style.
4. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
5. Chill.
6. Serve over ice and garnish with extra **berries**.

3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Top with **soda water**.
5. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.

cocktail.388.name: Mojito Pomegranate
cocktail.388.instructions:
1. Muddle 4 sprigs of **mint** and 2 teaspoons of **sugar** in a highball glass.
2. Add 30 ml of **lime juice**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Fill the glass with crushed **ice**.
5. Pour 45 ml of **white rum** and 60 ml of **pomegranate juice**, and top with 90 ml of **soda water**.
6. Garnish with a sprig of **mint** leaves.

cocktail.389.description: Bittersweet and very refreshing cocktail with hints of zesty citrus freshness.
cocktail.389.instructions:
1. Fill a glass with about **ice**.
2. Pour in 50 ml of **Amaro Montenegro** and 120 ml of **tonic**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice wheel.

cocktail.390.description: An Old Fashioned-style variation with **rye whiskey** and **Benedictine**.
cocktail.390.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **rye Whiskey**, 7.5 ml of **Benedictine**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.

cocktail.391.name: Motox
cocktail.391.description: A refreshing and aromatic citrus-forward cocktail that balances the spicy kick of fresh **ginger** and **coriander** with the bright notes of **lemon** **vodka** and **limoncello**, rounded off with tropical juices.
cocktail.391.instructions:
1. Muddle the fresh **ginger** and **coriander** leaves in a shaker to release their aromatic oils.
2. Add the **vodka citron**, **limoncello**, **pineapple juice**, and **apple juice** to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass to remove small bits of **ginger** and herbs.
6. Garnish with a fresh sprig of **coriander**.

cocktail.392.name: Mrs Daisy Robinson
cocktail.392.description: An elegant and sparkling **pisco**-based drink that offers a sophisticated blend of tropical **pineapple** and tart **grapefruit**, finished with the effervescence of **prosecco**.
cocktail.392.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 25 ml of **pisco**, 15 ml of **pineapple syrup**, 15 ml of **grapefruit juice**, 5 ml of **lime juice**, and 2 dashes of **creole bitters**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled flute glass.
5. Top with 50 ml of **prosecco**.
6. Garnish with a wedge of **pineapple**.

1. Fill a hurricane glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **vodka**, 30 ml of **coffee liqueur**, 30 ml of **Irish cream**, and 2 scoops of **ice cream**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with 5 **chocolate syrup** ml and 2 shavings of **chocolate**.

2. Add 30 ml of **vodka**, 30 ml of **coffee liqueur**, 30 ml of **Irish cream**, and 45 ml of **heavy cream**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.

cocktail.395.name: Mulled Wine
cocktail.395.description: Also called "glühwein" in German, this drink is very popular in German-speaking countries and France. Spices can be varied greatly – just use what you like.
cocktail.395.instructions:
1. Heat a bottle or more of **red wine** in a pan.
2. Add **cinnamon sticks**, **cloves**, **sugar**, **vanilla** pods, **anise** and **lemon** wedges.
3. Heat until the wine almost boils, and serve in cups.
4. Garnish each cup with a **cinnamon stick**.

1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.

cocktail.400.name: Negroni Sbagliato
cocktail.400.description: A sparkling variation of the classic Negroni in which **prosecco** replaces **gin**, creating a lighter and more refreshing aperitif.
cocktail.400.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Campari** and 30 ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Top with 40 ml **prosecco**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktail.401.name: Neptune's Wrath
cocktail.401.description: The creation of this cocktail is credited to toby malone, who first prepared it for the violet hour in Chicago.
cocktail.401.instructions:
1. Pour 45 ml of **gin**, 7.5 ml of **absinthe**, 15 ml of **rich simple syrup**, 22.5 ml of **lemon juice**, 7.5 ml of **green Chartreuse** and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail.402.name: New York Sour
cocktail.402.description: **Whiskey** sour finished with a float of **red wine**.
cocktail.402.instructions:
1. Add 60 ml of **bourbon**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 20 ml of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Float 15 ml of **red wine** on top.
7. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**, then express the oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish as well.

cocktail.403.name: Northern Light
cocktail.403.description: Wonderfully refreshing: apple and anise served up on a grassy **vodka** base. Similar to the **Szarlotka** cocktail.
cocktail.403.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Bizon Grass vodka**, 22.5 ml of **apple schnapps**, 15 ml of **anis**, 30 ml of **apple juice**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 15 ml of **rich simple syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fine strain into a chilled glass.
5. Garnish with a star anise floated on the surface.

cocktail.404.name: Nutty Irishman
cocktail.404.description: A smooth, creamy classic that highlights the harmonious blend of hazelnut and **Irish cream**. Perfect for fans of dessert-style cocktails, it offers a rich texture and a comforting nutty finish that can be customised with coffee or **whiskey**.
cocktail.404.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Frangelico**, 30 ml of **Baileys**, and 30 ml of **cream** to the shaker.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Optionally, top with a layer of loose **whipped cream**.
6. Garnish with a sprinkle of freshly grated **nutmeg**.

cocktail.410.name: Opal Café
cocktail.410.description: A velvety layered shooter that combines the bold, **anise**-flavored depth of **black sambuca** with rich **espresso** and a silky **cream** float.
cocktail.410.instructions:
1. Pour the **black sambuca** into a chilled shooter glass.
2. Gently layer the **espresso** over the **sambuca** using the back of a bar spoon.
3. Carefully float the **cream** on top as the final layer.
4. Serve immediately to maintain the distinct layers.

cocktail.411.name: Orange Rosemary Tonic
cocktail.411.description: A bright non-alcoholic highball of **orange juice**, **tonic**, and aromatic **rosemary**.
cocktail.411.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 90 ml of **orange juice** and 30 ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Top with 120 ml of **tonic**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with a **rosemary** sprig.

cocktail.412.name: Orgasm
cocktail.412.description: A popular, indulgent dessert cocktail known for its sweet, creamy profile. This version features a potent mix of **orange** liqueurs and **Irish cream** served over **ice**.
cocktail.412.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **Cointreau**, 30 ml of **Baileys**, and 20 ml of **Grand Marnier**.
3. Stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktail.413.description: This orgasm shot is a layered delight with **coffee liqueur**, **Irish cream**, and **amaretto**.
cocktail.413.instructions:
1. Pour 15 ml of **coffee liqueur** into the base of a shot glass.
2. Layer on 15 ml of **Irish cream**
3. Top with 15 ml of **amaretto**.

cocktail.414.name: Ouzi
cocktail.414.description: A bright **vodka** sour balancing **vodka**, **Ouzo**, **rich simple syrup** with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktail.414.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **vodka**, 45 ml of **Ouzo**, 20 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 15 ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.

cocktail.415.name: Pacha Sao Paulo
cocktail.415.description: A tropical rum cocktail with **mango**, **dark rum**, **coconut liqueur**, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with **cherry**.
cocktail.415.instructions:
1. Muddle 3 pieces of **mango** in the bottom of a shaker.
2. Add 90 ml of **dark rum**, 22.5 ml of **coconut liqueur**, 22.5 ml of **grenadine**, and 100 ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a hurricane glass.
6. Garnish with 2 **cherries**.

cocktail.416.description: A signature drink of pusser's rum, first created in the 1970s by daphne henderson at the soggy dollar bar in the British virgin islands.
cocktail.416.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **dark rum**, 30 ml of **coconut milk**, 90 ml of **pineapple juice**, and 30 ml of **orange juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.
5. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktail.417.name: Pale Charlie
cocktail.417.description: A sophisticated and aromatic long drink that balances the tartness of **sloe gin** and citrus with the depth of **apricot brandy** and a refreshing **ale** finish.
cocktail.417.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 22.5 ml of **sloe gin**, 22.5 ml of **apricot brandy**, 22.5 ml of **grapefruit juice**, 22.5 ml of **lime juice**, and 2 dashes of **absinthe**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a Collins glass filled.
5. Top up with 90 ml of **ale**.

cocktail.418.description: Mexico's favorite cocktail, featuring a perfect harmony of tart **grapefruit**, zesty **lime**, and premium **tequila** for a refreshing citrus experience.
cocktail.418.instructions:
1. If you prefer a salted rim, rub the edge of a highball glass with a **lime** wedge and dip it in **salt**.
2. Fill the glass halfway with **ice**.
3. Add 60 ml of **tequila blanco**, 15 ml of **agave syrup**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 120 ml of **grapefruit soda**.
4. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
5. Garnish with the **lime** wedge.

1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.

4. Strain into a highball glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Top with 90 ml of **soda water**.

cocktail.426.name: Pastis Whisky Sour
cocktail.426.description: Pastis adds a pleasing hint of anise and liquorice to a classic **Scotch whisky sour**.
cocktail.426.instructions:
1. Add 50 ml of **Scotch whisky**, 10 ml of **Ricard**, 25 ml of **lemon juice**, 12.5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, an **egg white**, and 3 dashes of **Angostura bitters** to a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Fine strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a skewered **lemon** wheel and a **maraschino cherry**.

cocktail.427.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **bourbon**, 20 ml of **Pedro Ximenez sherry**, a dash of **Angostura bitters**, and 2 dashes of **creole bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.

1. Muddle 3 pieces of fresh **ginger** in a shaker tin.
2. Add 60 ml of blended **Scotch whisky**, 25 ml of **lemon juice**, and 25 ml of **honey syrup**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).

7. Garnish with a **ginger candy**.

1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin**, 10 ml of **dry vermouth**, and 10 ml of **red vermouth**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail.439.name: Popinjay
cocktail.439.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward cocktail that balances the warmth of **cognac** with the herbal bitterness of **Cynar** and the botanical complexity of **Punt e Mes**.
cocktail.439.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 22.5 ml of **cognac**, 22.5 ml of **Cynar**, 22.5 ml of **Punt e Mes**, and a **orange** twist.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.

cocktail.440.name: Porn Star Martini
cocktail.440.description: An exotic and visually stunning modern classic, featuring vibrant **passion fruit** flavours and served with a celebratory Sidecar of **sparkling wine**.
cocktail.440.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 50 ml of **vodka vanilla**, 20 ml of **passion fruit liqueur**, 15 ml of **passion fruit syrup**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, and 10 ml of **vanilla syrup**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Serve with 60 ml of **champagne** on the side.
6. Garnish with a half of **passion fruit**.

cocktail.441.name: Porto Flip
cocktail.441.description: A velvety and decadent dessert cocktail that combines the richness of **port** wine and **cognac** with a creamy texture from a fresh **egg yolk**.
cocktail.441.instructions:
1. Pour 15 ml of **cognac**, 45 ml of **tawny port**, and an **egg yolk** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice** to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or small goblet.
6. Dust the surface with a pinch of freshly grated **nutmeg**.

cocktail.442.name: Porto Tonico
cocktail.442.description: The Porto Tonico is Portugal’s version of the gin and tonic. This light, refreshing cocktail is made with just white port and tonic water. It’s the perfect easy-sipping drink for warm days, casual get-togethers, or whenever you want something chic and unexpected.
cocktail.442.instructions:
1. Fill a glass with about **ice**.
2. Pour in 45 ml of **White Port** and 90 ml of **tonic**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** slice and **mint** sprig.

2. Add 45 ml of **bourbon**, 22.5 ml of **Benedictine**, 22.5 ml of **red vermouth**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.

cocktail.444.name: Pussyfoot
cocktail.444.description: A classic prohibition-era fruit mocktail combining citrus and tropical juices with grenadine.
cocktail.444.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **orange juice**, 60 ml of **grapefruit juice**, 30 ml of **pineapple juice**, and 10 ml of **grenadine**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a hurricane glass over fresh **ice**.
5. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktail.445.name: PX Flip
cocktail.445.description: Lighter in alcohol, but still very full of flavour, this is a modern classic that is hugely popular during winter.
cocktail.445.instructions:
1. Muddle 4 **cloves** in the bottom of a shaker.
2. Add 60 ml of **Pedro Ximenez sherry**, 20 ml of **lemon juice**, 10 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and an **egg yolk**.
3. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
4. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
5. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
6. Strain into a chilled glass.
7. Garnish with a pinch of grated **cinnamon**.

cocktail.446.name: Rabo de Galo
cocktail.446.description: A classic brazilian staple that translates to 'tail of the rooster'. This drink is a complex, bittersweet harmony of **cachaça** and herbal **amaro**, offering a deep and punchy flavour profile that is both rustic and refined.
cocktail.446.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **cachaça**, 20 ml of **red vermouth**, 15 ml of **Cynar**, and 2 dashes of **Angostura bitters**.
3. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
5. Express oils from an **orange** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.447.name: Rafaello
cocktail.447.description: Inspired by the famous confectionery, this cocktail is a decadent dessert in a glass. It combines the creaminess of **Irish cream** with tropical coconut and sweet **vanilla** for a silky, indulgent treat.
cocktail.447.instructions:
1. Rim a snifter glass with **coconut flakes** by lightly wetting the edge and dipping it into the flakes.
2. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
3. Add **Irish cream**, **coconut liqueur**, and **vanilla syrup**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Double strain the mixture into the prepared snifter glass.
6. Sprinkle any remaining **coconut flakes** on top for an extra touch of texture.

cocktail.448.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
cocktail.448.description: A frothy **gin** fizz with citrus, **cream**, and a hint of **orange flower water**.
cocktail.448.instructions:
1. Pour 45 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **lime juice**, 30 ml of **simple syrup**, 3 dashes of **orange flower water**, 60 ml of **cream**, 3 drops of **vanilla extract** and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled collins glass.
6. Top with 60 ml of **soda water**.
7. Garnish with an **orange** slice.

cocktail.449.name: Raspberry Collins
cocktail.449.description: A popular modern-day adaptation of the classic collins with a whopping amount of **lemon juice**, yet it is far from being overly sour.
cocktail.449.instructions:
1. Muddle 10 **raspberries** in the base of the shaker.
2. Add 60 ml of **gin**, 15 ml of **raspberry liqueur**, 45 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **rich simple syrup**, and 2 dashes of **orange bitters**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice** and shake for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a glass filled with **ice**.
5. Top with 30 ml of **soda water**.
6. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
7. Garnish with a skewered **lemon** wheel and a **raspberry**.

cocktail.450.name: Rattlesnake
cocktail.450.description: A strong **whiskey**-based cocktail from the 1930s, first documented in **The Savoy Cocktail Book**. the original note says it is "so called because it will either cure rattlesnake bite, or kill rattlesnake, and, moreover, make you see double.".
cocktail.450.instructions:
1. Pour 60 ml of **rye whiskey**, a dash of **absinthe**, 2 teaspoons of **lemon juice**, 2 teaspoons of **simple syrup**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.470.description: A rich, creamy wine drink featuring **egg white**, **Amontillado sherry**, **spiced rum**—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with **nutmeg**.
cocktail.470.instructions:
1. Pour 30 ml of **spiced rum**, 30 ml of **Amontillado sherry**, 30 ml of **demerara sugar syrup**, 30 ml of **milk**, 30 ml of **cream**, and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg** and a **cinnamon** stick.

1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.

1. Fill a pitcher with 300 g of **ice**.

cocktail.482.instructions:
1. Rinse a chilled rocks glass with **absinthe**, swirling to coat the sides, and discard the excess.
2. In a separate mixing glass, muddle a **sugar** cube with **Peychaud's bitters** until dissolved.
3. Add 20 ml of **cognac** (or **rye whiskey**) and fill the mixing glass with **ice**.
4. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into the prepared **absinthe**-rinsed glass without **ice**.
6. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish.

cocktail.491.instructions:
For 3 shots:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **Midori Melon liqueur** and 45 ml of **pineapple juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into 3 chilled shooter glasses.
5. Carefully pour 7.5 ml (1/4 oz) of **Chambord** into each glass so it sinks to the bottom.
6. Slowly layer 7.5 ml (1/4 oz) of **Jägermeister** on top of each shot using the back of a spoon.

cocktail.499.description: A legendary tropical **gin**-based punch, famous for its complex fruity profile, vibrant pink hue, and refreshing botanical finish.

4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.

cocktail.501.name: Sloe Gin Fizz

1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **sloe gin**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, and 15 ml of **rich simple syrup**.

4. Strain into a chilled highball glass.

cocktail.502.name: Smoky Whiskey Sour
cocktail.502.description: A variation of the classic "whisky sour" created by Simon Difford for people who like the distinct smoky flavour of Scotch Islay whisky.
cocktail.502.instructions:
1. Pour 30 ml of **Scotch whisky**, 30 ml of **Islay Scotch whisky**, 30 ml of **lemon juice**, 20 ml of **maple syrup**, a dash of **Angostura bitters**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with a **lemon** peel.

cocktail.517.description: A vibrant and fruity twist on the traditional **Piña Colada**. This tropical delight blends **white rum** and creamy coconut with the sweet, tart flavour of fresh strawberries, creating a lush pink cocktail perfect for summer sipping.

1. Fill a blender with 150 g of **ice** cubes or crushed **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **white rum** and 20 ml of **strawberry liqueur**.

4. Blend on high speed until the mixture reaches a smooth, slushy consistency.
5. Pour the contents into a hurricane or chilled goblet glass.
6. Garnish with a **strawberry**.
7. Optionally, top with a dollop of **whipped cream** for extra decadence.

For 3 shots:
1. Into a shaker with **ice** pour 45 ml of **coconut rum** and 45 ml of **pineapple juice**.

cocktail.539.name: The Cheshire Cat
cocktail.539.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward **brandy** cocktail that balances the herbal notes of **rosemary** with the deep complexity of **cognac** and **Scotch whisky**. Subtle hints of **cherry** and **cinnamon** provide a warm, aromatic finish, making it an ideal choice for slow sipping.
cocktail.539.instructions:
1. Gently muddle the fresh **rosemary** sprig in the bottom of a mixing glass to release its aromatic oils.
2. Add the **cognac**, **Scotch whisky**, **Cherry Heering**, **Punt e Mes**, and **cinnamon syrup** to the mixing glass.
3. Fill the glass with **ice**.
4. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and discard the peel or use it as garnish.
7. Garnish with a fresh **rosemary** sprig and a **cinnamon** stick for a fragrant presentation.

cocktail.541.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 45 ml of **white rum**, 10 ml of **bianco vermouth**, 15 ml of **pineapple syrup** and 20 ml of **lemon juice**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Fill a chilled collins glass with **ice** and strain the cocktail into the glass.

cocktail.542.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with **ice**.
2. Add 25 ml of **bourbon**, 20 ml of **rye whiskey**, 12.5 ml of **Punt e Mes**, 12.5 ml of **strucchi bitter** (or **Campari**), and 5 ml of **crème de mure**.
3. Add a dash of **Angostura bitters** and a dash of **orange bitters**.
4. Stir gently for about 20 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Garnish with a **blackberry**.

4. Strain into a chilled Tiki glass.

cocktail.545.description: A rich, creamy dessert cocktail often compared to eggnog or a milkshake-style serve.

1. Pour 60 ml of **cognac**, 22.5 ml of **milk**, 22.5 ml of **heavy cream**, 7.5 ml of **rich simple syrup**, 2 drops of **vanilla extract**, a pinch of **cinnamon**, and an **egg white**.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass.
6. Garnish with a pinch of **nutmeg**.

cocktail.564.description: An elegant **grappa**-based sour that beautifully balances the intensity of the spirit with the soothing notes of chamomile and **honey syrup**.
cocktail.564.instructions:
1. Pour 45 ml of **grappa**, 25 ml of **lemon juice**, 15 ml of **honey syrup**, 15 ml of **chamomile cordial**, and an **egg white** into a shaker.
2. Dry shake (without **ice**) vigorously for about 15 seconds to emulsify the **egg**.
3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Express oils from a **lemon** peel over the drink and use it as a garnish, and garnish with 3 **grapes**.

3. Add about 150 g of **ice**.
4. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with fresh **ice** (preferably over a large cube).
6. Garnish with an **orange** slice, a **maraschino cherry**, and 3 drops of **Angostura bitters**.

cocktail.587.name: White Christmas Martini
cocktail.587.description: A festive and creamy spirit-forward cocktail that blends smooth **vanilla vodka** with a refreshing peppermint kick. This elegant drink is perfectly balanced with **half-and-half** for a velvety texture, making it a sophisticated choice for holiday celebrations.
cocktail.587.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with **ice**.
2. Add 60 ml of **vanilla vodka**, 30 ml of **peppermint schnapps**, and 30 ml of **half-and-half**.
3. Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
5. Garnish with a **peppermint candy**.

cocktail.601.description: A refreshing and effervescent long drink that captures the spirit of the mediterranean. It combines the crispness of **white rum** with zesty **limoncello** and sparkling **lemon tonic** for an easy-sipping summer experience.
cocktail.601.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass halfway with **ice**.
2. Add 30 ml of **white rum**, 30 ml of **limoncello**, and 100 ml of **lemon tonic**.
3. Stir very gently to combine without losing carbonation.
4. Garnish with an **orange** wedge.

cocktail.602.name: Zombie
cocktail.602.description: A legendary and potent Tiki classic that blends multiple rums, fresh **lime**, and tropical spice for a complex, sun-soaked experience.
cocktail.602.instructions:
1. Add **Jamaican dark rum**, 45 ml **gold Puerto Rican rum**, **demerara rum**, fresh **lime juice**, **falernum**, **don's mix**, **grenadine**, **Angostura bitters**, and **Pernod** into a blender.
2. Add 180 g of crushed **ice**.
3. Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds.
4. Pour the contents into a tall glass or Tiki glass and add additional crushed **ice** to fill if necessary.
5. Garnish with a **mint** sprig.

cocktail.603.name: Zombie Brain Tumor
cocktail.603.description: A dramatic layered shooter with minty sweetness, creamy body, and a vivid grenadine accent.
cocktail.603.instructions:
1. Pour 20 ml of **crème de menthe green** into a shooter glass.
2. Slowly layer 20 ml of **Baileys** (**Irish cream** liqueur) so it forms a brain-like shape.
3. Add 5 ml of **grenadine**, a drop at a time to create a bleeding effect.
